effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.3 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 610,354.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,452, further increased by 907 while you remain within its light.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,278 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 191 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Every 10 seconds in combat take 1% of your maximum Health as Nature damage and gain a stack of Symbiosis, granting 146 Versatility for 20 sec stacking up to 5 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
